result.markdown:
---
title: "분기별 선형모형"
date: "2023/10/26"
author: "Sungil Park"
description: "2023-2학기 R로 하는 금융데이터분석"
---




## Data


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data_bin <- readxl::read_xlsx("contents/2. 예측수준의 결정.xlsx",sheet = 2)
data_sim <- readxl::read_xlsx("contents/2. 예측수준의 결정.xlsx",sheet = 3)

data_bin %>% head() %>% kable()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
|  t| year| quat| in1_bin| mul_bin| jas_bin| cha_bin|
|--:|----:|----:|-------:|-------:|-------:|-------:|
|  1| 2016|    1|    5.71|    8.42|    0.95|   15.84|
|  2| 2016|    2|    6.16|    8.20|    0.75|   14.61|
|  3| 2016|    3|    6.54|    8.73|    0.78|   15.37|
|  4| 2016|    4|    6.64|    9.01|    0.87|   15.39|
|  5| 2017|    1|    5.88|    9.06|    1.05|   16.68|
|  6| 2017|    2|    6.02|    8.41|    0.61|   13.98|
:::
:::




## 분기별 선형모형

### in1_bin


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
data_bin %>% ggplot(aes(x=t, y=in1_bin, color = factor(quat)))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(data = data_bin,aes(x=t,y=in1_bin,color = factor(quat)),method = "lm",se=FALSE)+
  theme_minimal()
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}
```
`geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
```
:::

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](1026__files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-4-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::


#### 1분기
 
$$
y = 5.58161 + 0.08196 * t
$$

 - R-squared :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8613146
```
:::
:::

 - adj R-squared :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8335775
```
:::
:::

 - p-value :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.002563184
```
:::
:::

#### 2분기
 
$$
y = 5.69036 + 0.08661 * t
$$

 - R-squared :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8707973
```
:::
:::

 - adj R-squared :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8449568
```
:::
:::

 - p-value :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.002139097
```
:::
:::


#### 3분기
 
$$
y = 5.98027 + 0.09741 * t
$$

 - R-squared :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.942346
```
:::
:::

 - adj R-squared :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.9308152
```
:::
:::

 - p-value :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.0002767648
```
:::
:::



#### 4분기
 
$$
y = 6.02714 + 0.9991 * t
$$



 - R-squared :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8682876
```
:::
:::

 - adj R-squared :


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.8419451
```
:::
:::

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 0.002246747
```
